Text:
So, what's the difference between this and zeppfan1968's torrent? I grabbed that a while back. Is this better? I thought his were from the Black Box remasters also.

Just asking before I go and download.

Aren't the remastered albums supposed to be double CD's with alternate versions of the songs?
This torrent doesn't have the second CD's.
Thanks for the reply. I think I'll grab these and re-burn to CD.

^^^ No problem.  The music is important enough to me that I wanted to put it all (the Ozzy & Dio years anyway) in one place for anyone to enjoy.

Rock on.....
is the paranoid the vertigo version?
Thank you so much for this one man...seriously!

The difference:
On the other torrent does not appears the Live At Last album (one of their best)
